trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> implementations.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別 (Base Class) 給 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> can be used to create and retrieve instances of code generators and code compilers.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>可用來建立和擷取程式碼產生器和程式碼編譯器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Code generators can be used to generate code in a particular language, and code compilers can be used to compile code into assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼產生器可以用來產生特定語言的程式碼，且程式碼編譯器可將程式碼編譯為組件。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the methods made available in the code generator and code compiler are available directly from the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、 方法可在程式碼產生器和程式碼編譯器都可以直接從程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> or <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A> to access the methods, and those methods are marked as obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>或<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A>存取方法，而且這些方法會標示為過時。

trans-unit.source: This applies to preexisting as well as new code provider implementations.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於已存在和新的程式碼提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation typically provides code generation and/or code compilation interfaces for generating code and managing compilation for a single programming language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作通常會提供程式碼來產生程式碼和管理單一的程式語言的編譯產生及/或程式碼編譯介面。

trans-unit.source: Several languages are supported by <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementations that ship with the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 支援數種語言<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>隨附的實作[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: These languages include C#, Visual Basic, C++, and JScript.
trans-unit.target: 這些語言包括 C#、 Visual Basic、 c + + 和 JScript。

trans-unit.source: Developers or compiler vendors can implement the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interfaces and provide a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> that extends CodeDOM support to other programming languages.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員或廠商編譯器可以實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>介面，並提供<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>延伸 CodeDOM 其他程式設計語言的支援。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file (Machine.config) provides a mechanism for developers and compiler vendors to add configuration settings for additional <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementations.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔 (Machine.config) 提供開發人員和編譯器廠商，以加入其他的組態設定的機制<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> class provides static methods to discover and enumerate the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementations on a computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>類別提供靜態方法來探索及列舉<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A> method returns the settings for all <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementations on a computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A>方法會傳回所有的設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A> method returns the settings for a specific <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation, based on the programming language name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>方法會傳回特定的設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作中，以程式設計的語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> method returns an instance of a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a specific language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>方法傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>特定語言的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more details on language provider settings in the configuration file, see [Compiler and Language Provider Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關組態檔中的語言提供者設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[編譯器和語言提供者設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8)。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓連結要求和繼承要求在類別層級。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown if either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>立即呼叫者或衍生的類別不具有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: The following example program can generate and compile source code based on a CodeDOM model of a program that prints "Hello World" using the <xref:System.Console> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式可以產生和編譯的程式會列印"Hello World"使用 CodeDOM 模型為基礎的原始碼<xref:System.Console>類別。

trans-unit.source: A Windows Forms user interface is provided.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows Form 使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: The user can select the target programming language from several selections: C#, Visual Basic, and JScript.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以選取目標程式語言，從多個選項： C#、 Visual Basic 和 JScript。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 針對繼承者完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />, <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />, <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" />, and <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，程式碼提供者所組成的實作<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />， <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />， <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" />，和<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />, <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser" />, and <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> methods are obsolete, and the methods of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> and <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> are directly available in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]、 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />， <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser" />，和<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" />方法已過時，以及的方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />和<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />直接用於<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />類別。

trans-unit.source: You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods.
trans-unit.target: 您應該在您的程式碼提供者實作中覆寫這些方法，並呼叫基底的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> object that indicates the settings for the compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> 物件，指示編譯的設定值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> that indicates the code to compile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> 型別的陣列，表示要編譯的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an assembly based on the <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> trees contained in the specified array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> objects, using the specified compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編譯器設定，根據 <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> 物件之指定陣列所包含的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> 樹狀結構，編譯一個組件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> object that indicates the results of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> 物件，指示編譯的結果。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code compilers.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼編譯器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code compiler.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼編譯器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> object that indicates the settings for the compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> 物件，指示編譯的設定值。

trans-unit.source: An array of the names of the files to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要編譯的檔案名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an assembly from the source code contained in the specified files, using the specified compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編譯器設定，在指定檔案所包含的原始程式碼中，編譯組件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> object that indicates the results of compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> 物件，表示編譯的結果。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code compilers.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼編譯器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code compiler.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼編譯器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> object that indicates the compiler settings for this compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters" /> 物件，指示這個編譯的編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: An array of source code strings to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要編譯的原始程式碼字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an assembly from the specified array of strings containing source code, using the specified compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編譯器設定，在含有原始程式碼的指定陣列中，編譯一個組件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> object that indicates the results of compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> 物件，表示編譯的結果。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code compilers.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateCompiler" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼編譯器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼編譯器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new code compiler.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請建立新的程式碼編譯器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> that can be used for compilation of <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> based source code representations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />，可以用來編譯以 <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> 為基礎的原始程式碼表示。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已過時中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The recommended alternative is to call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> methods that are directly available in the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 建議的替代方式是呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>直接用於程式碼提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you should implement the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" /> members in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> class and throw a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，您應該實作<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler" />中的成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />類別，並擲回<see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />當呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The string for which to create an escaped identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要建立逸出識別項的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates an escaped identifier for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 為指定值建立逸出識別項。

trans-unit.source: The escaped identifier for the value.
trans-unit.target: 值的逸出識別項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateEscapedIdentifier%2A> tests whether the identifier conflicts with any reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateEscapedIdentifier%2A> 測試與任何保留的識別項的衝突是否或語言關鍵字，如果是的話，會傳回具有特定語言的逸出程式碼格式設定的對等名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is referred to an escaped identifier.
trans-unit.target: 這被指逸出識別項。

trans-unit.source: The escaped identifier contains the same `value` but has escape-code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword.
trans-unit.target: 逸出識別項包含相同`value`但加上逸出程式碼格式，以便區別的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Two implementation examples are preceding the `value` with "@" or bracketing the `value` with "[" and "]".
trans-unit.target: 兩個實作的範例是前面`value`與"@"或方括號`value`與"["和"]"。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code generators.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼產生器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code generator.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼產生器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new code generator.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請建立新的程式碼產生器。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new code generator.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請建立新的程式碼產生器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> that can be used to generate <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> based source code representations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />，可以用來產生以 <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> 為基礎的原始程式碼表示。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已過時中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The recommended alternative is to call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> methods that are directly available in the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 建議的替代方式是呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>方法中直接提供<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you should implement the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> members in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> class and throw a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，您應該實作<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />中的成員<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />類別，並擲回<see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />當呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.target: 用來輸出的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請使用指定的輸出 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 建立新的程式碼產生器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> that can be used to generate <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> based source code representations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />，可以用來產生以 <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> 為基礎的原始程式碼表示。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用指定<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>輸出。

trans-unit.source: This method supports more optimized code generation that incrementally updates the source code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援多個累加地更新原始碼的最佳化程式碼產生。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation calls the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] and results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> if an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> object is not returned.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別實作會呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>方法中的過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]且導致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>就不會傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: The file name to output to.
trans-unit.target: 要輸出的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請使用指定的輸出檔名建立新的程式碼產生器。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation calls the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] and results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> if an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> object is not returned.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別實作會呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>方法中的過時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]且導致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>就不會傳回物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new code parser.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請建立新的程式碼剖析器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" /> that can be used to parse source code.
trans-unit.target: 可以用來剖析原始程式碼的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" />。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個基底實作一定會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance for the specified language.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定語言的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> instance for the specified language.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定語言的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM provider that is implemented for the specified language name.
trans-unit.target: 為特定語言名稱實作的 CodeDOM 提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method is most commonly used to create an instance of a code provider in an application that may optionally use one of several providers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法最常用於可能選擇性地使用數個提供者的其中一個應用程式中建立程式碼提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> allows you to specify at run time the code provider you wish to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> 可讓您在執行階段指定您想要具現化的程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If you know at design time which code provider is to be used, you should create an instance of that code provider rather than use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您知道哪一個程式碼提供者所使用的設計階段，您應該建立該程式碼提供者的執行個體而使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> method returns a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> instance for a specific language name; it is similar to calling the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the language provider type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>執行個體做為特定的語言名稱，則類似於呼叫<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>語言提供者型別方法。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> when you want to dynamically find a configured provider implementation for a language name.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>當您想要以動態方式找出的語言名稱的設定提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: If more than one provider implementation is configured for the language name, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> returns a provider instance for the last matching configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個以上的提供者實作設定的語言名稱<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>傳回最後一個相符的組態項目的提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload when you want a specific language provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載，當您想要的特定語言提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> method to get a provider instance that supports the language name `"CSharp"`; use the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload to get a provider instance specifically for the <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>方法來取得提供者執行個體支援的語言名稱`"CSharp"`; 使用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載來取得提供者執行個體，專為<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作。

trans-unit.source: You should use the [\], CultureInfo, Object\<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method if you have multiple code providers for a language and you desire to instantiate a specific code provider.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用 [\]，CultureInfo、 物件\<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%2CSystem.Reflection.Binder%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType > 如果您有多個語言的程式碼提供者，而且您想要的特定程式碼提供者具現化的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A> method checks whether at least one provider implementation supports a specific language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A>方法會檢查是否至少一個提供者實作都支援特定的語言。

trans-unit.source: You can validate a language name using <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A> before passing it to <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用語言名稱<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A>再傳遞給<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you pass an unsupported language name to <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您傳遞至不支援的語言名稱<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A><xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A> method can be used to determine all <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementations on a computer, including additional implementations provided by developers and compiler vendors that are identified in the [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file (Machine.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A>方法可以用來判斷所有<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作的電腦上，包括開發人員和中所識別的編譯器廠商所提供的其他實作[ <system.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)電腦組態檔 (Machine.config) 中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A> method returns an instance of a <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for a specific language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider%2A>方法傳回的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>特定語言的實作。

trans-unit.source: Language names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 語言名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateValidIdentifier%2A> tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, attempts to return a valid identifier name that does not conflict.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateValidIdentifier%2A> 測試是否與保留衝突的識別項或多個語言關鍵字，如果，嘗試傳回有效的識別項名稱，並不會衝突。

trans-unit.source: Usually the returned identifier is only slightly modified to differentiate the identifier from the keyword; for example, the name might be preceded by the underscore ("_") character.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的識別項通常只會稍微修改，以便識別項區別的關鍵字;例如，名稱可能會加底線 ("_") 字元。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation is called by the base class.

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code generators.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼產生器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code generator.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼產生器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default file name extension to use for source code files in the current language.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語言的原始程式碼檔案所使用的預設副檔名。

trans-unit.source: A file name extension corresponding to the extension of the source files of the current language.
trans-unit.target: 對應至目前語言的原始程式碼的檔案名稱的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個基底實作一定會傳回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by code generators and code compilers to indicate what file extensions should be generated or used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性供程式碼產生器和程式碼編譯器，指出應該產生或使用檔案的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the provider name, hash code and default file name extension for the new provider instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會顯示提供者名稱、 雜湊程式碼和預設副檔名為新的提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> for which to generate code.
trans-unit.target: 要為其產生程式碼的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to which the output code is sent.
trans-unit.target: 接收輸出程式碼的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions" /> that indicates the options to use for generating code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions" />，表示要用來產生程式碼的選項。

trans-unit.source: Generates code for the specified Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) compilation unit and sends it to the specified text writer, using the specified options.
trans-unit.target: 產生指定程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM) 編譯單位 (Compilation Unit) 的程式碼，並使用指定的選項將其傳送至指定的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit%2A> method to generate code for a "Hello World" application from a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit%2A>方法來產生程式碼中的"Hello World"應用程式<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A> method to enumerate the language provider settings on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetAllCompilerInfo%2A>方法來列舉電腦上的語言提供者設定。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the default language providers supplied by the .NET Framework are not specified in the [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) compiler configuration section and cannot be removed, so this method returns information about the default providers and any specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，.NET Framework 所提供的預設語言提供者中未指定[ <system.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)編譯器組態區段，並不能移除，因此這個方法會傳回預設的提供者和組態檔中指定任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉電腦上的語言提供者，並顯示每個語言提供者的組態和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.target: 傳回指定語言的語言提供者和編譯器組態設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> object populated with settings of the configured <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 已設定 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo" /> 實作設定填入的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>電腦上的實作。

trans-unit.source: For information about machine configuration files, see the Machine Configuration Files section in [Configuring Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f).
trans-unit.target: 電腦組態檔的相關資訊，請參閱中的電腦組態檔區段[設定應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A> method searches each provider configuration element for the specified language name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>方法會搜尋指定的語言名稱的每個提供者組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance contains the configured language provider and compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>執行個體會包含設定的語言提供者和編譯器設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A> method checks whether at least one provider implementation supports a specific language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A>方法會檢查是否至少一個提供者實作都支援特定的語言。

trans-unit.source: You can validate a language name using <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A> before passing it to <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用語言名稱<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedLanguage%2A>再傳遞給<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This prevents throwing a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you access the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo> instance for an unsupported language name.
trans-unit.target: 這可避免擲回<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>存取時<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerInfo>不支援的語言名稱的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If more than one provider implementation is configured for the input language name, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A> returns the settings from the last matching provider configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個以上的提供者實作名稱所設定的輸入的語言，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetCompilerInfo%2A>組態項目會傳回來自最後一個相符的提供者設定。

trans-unit.source: Language names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 語言名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for an input language and displays the configured settings for the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會判斷<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作的輸入的語言，並顯示語言提供者設定的設定。

trans-unit.target: 物件的類型，要為其擷取類型轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定資料型別的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for the specified type, or <see langword="null" /> if a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for the specified type cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到特定型別的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，則為特定型別的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法以提供特定類型的型別轉換子的特定資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a language name associated with the specified file name extension, as configured in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> compiler configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定副檔名關聯的語言名稱，如 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 編譯器組態區段的設定。

trans-unit.source: A language name associated with the file name extension, as configured in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> compiler configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 與指定副檔名關聯的語言名稱，如 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> 編譯器組態設定的設定。

trans-unit.source: The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file (Machine.config) contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation on the computer.
trans-unit.target: [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)機器組態檔 (Machine.config) 包含每個語言提供者和編譯器組態設定<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>上的實作電腦。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A> method searches each provider configuration element for the specified file name extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>方法會搜尋指定的檔案名稱副檔名的每個提供者組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedExtension%2A> method checks whether at least one provider implementation supports a specific file name extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedExtension%2A>方法會檢查是否至少一個提供者實作都支援特定的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: You can validate a file name extension using <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedExtension%2A> before passing it to <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證檔案名稱副檔名 using<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsDefinedExtension%2A>再傳遞給<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This prevents <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A> from throwing a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> for an unsupported file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>擲回<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>不支援的檔案名稱副檔名。

trans-unit.source: If a provider implementation supports the input file name extension, and there are multiple supported languages configured for that provider, then <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A> returns the first language name for that provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者實作支援的輸入的檔案名稱副檔名，而且有多個支援的語言，然後設定該提供者，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>傳回該提供者的第一個語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: If more than one provider implementation is configured for the input file name extension, <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A> returns the language name from the last matching provider configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的檔案名稱副檔名，設定一個以上的提供者實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GetLanguageFromExtension%2A>從傳回的語言名稱最後一個相符的提供者組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Language names and file name extensions are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 語言名稱和檔案名稱的副檔名不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example determines the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider> implementation for an input file name extension and displays the configured settings for the language provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會判斷<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider>實作輸入的檔案名稱副檔名，並顯示語言提供者設定的設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> that indicates the type to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />，表示要傳回的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得由指定的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> 所指示的型別。

trans-unit.source: A text representation of the specified type, formatted for the language in which code is generated by this code generator.
trans-unit.target: 指定型別的文字表示，針對這個程式碼產生器產生程式碼所使用的語言格式化。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, for example, passing in a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> type will return "Integer".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Visual Basic 中，傳入 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference" /> 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 會傳回 "Integer"。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code generators.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼產生器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code generator.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼產生器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: A file name extension.

trans-unit.source: This method tests whether an identifier is valid.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會測試是否為有效的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsValidIdentifier%2A> method is provider specific.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsValidIdentifier%2A>方法是特定的提供者。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers that are valid for one provider might not be valid for other providers.
trans-unit.target: 適用於一個提供者的識別項可能不是有效的其他提供者。

trans-unit.source: If `value` contains characters outside of the ASCII character range, check the identifier for all the languages that might be used to compile the code.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`包含的字元之外的 ASCII 字元範圍，請檢查可能用來編譯程式碼的所有語言的識別項。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsValidIdentifier(System.String)" /> in a derived class, design the method to return <see langword="true" /> only if the value fits the rules of the language and does not conflict with a keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.IsValidIdentifier(System.String)" />在衍生類別中，設計方法，以傳回<see langword="true" />只有值符合語言的規則，而且不會以關鍵字衝突。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code generators.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼產生器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code generator.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您不使用程式碼產生器的程式碼提供者呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a language features identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得語言功能識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.LanguageOptions" /> that indicates special features of the language.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.LanguageOptions" />，表示語言的特殊功能。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> object that is used to read the code to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 物件，用於讀取要剖析的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the code read from the specified text stream into a <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定文字資料流中所讀取的程式碼編譯成 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> that contains a representation of the parsed code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />，含有剖析程式碼的表示。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.source: In version 2.0, this method can be called directly on the code provider even if it is not overridden by the code provider.
trans-unit.target: 在 2.0 版中，呼叫這個方法可以是直接在程式碼提供者即使它不會覆寫程式碼提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the code provider does not override this method, the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser> implementation is called by the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果程式碼提供者不會覆寫這個方法，<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser>實作會呼叫基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Neither this method nor the <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a parser in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code parsers.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會使用過時的衍生類別中建立的剖析器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateParser" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼剖析器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeParser" />執行此功能的實作。

trans-unit.source: You will get a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> if you call the base-class method from a code provider that does not use a code parser.
trans-unit.target: 您會收到<see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />如果您從程式碼提供者不使用程式碼剖析器呼叫基底類別方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified code generation support is provided.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否提供指定程式碼產生支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified code generation support is provided; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供指定程式碼產生支援，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called with a number of <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport> flags at once to test for a set of capabilities by joining a set of appropriate capability flags together with a binary `OR` operator (|).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以呼叫具有數<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport>旗標，一次，以加入一組適當的功能旗標，以及二進位檔的一組功能來測試`OR`運算子 (|)。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this method is provided by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> implementation that is returned by the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A> method of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，這個方法由<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>所傳回的實作<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator%2A>的提供者的方法。

trans-unit.target: 此方法或 <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> 方法都沒有在衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, you must not call the corresponding method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底類別的對應方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method creates a generator in the derived class using the obsolete <see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" /> method for compatibility with preexisting providers that use code generators.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法會建立使用過時的衍生類別中的產生器<see cref="M:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateGenerator" />與預先存在的提供者，使用程式碼產生器的相容性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The base-class method then calls the equivalent method in the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" /> implementation to perform this function.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別方法依序呼叫的對應方法<see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator" />執行此功能的實作。
